**Thorns of Hatred** â€” Choose a player each night and at the beginning of the game. The last player to vote for the player you chose each day becomes Scorned. If that players has no votes at the end of the day, you may Scorn two players of your choice instead.

- Your defense increases by a stage for every two Scorned players, including dead players.
